name: Tiramisu
description: A popular coffee-flavored dessert made from layers of ladyfingers dipped in coffee, mascarpone cheese, and dusted with cocoa powder.
steps: Mix egg yolks and sugar until pale and fluffy.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixed with a splash of coffee liqueur.
Layer the ladyfingers in a dish, spread over a layer of mascarpone mixture.
Repeat layering and refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Dust with cocoa powder before serving.
tips: Ensure all ingredients are at room temperature to make mixing easier.
For a non-alcoholic version, omit the coffee liqueur.
The dessert can be made a day ahead to allow flavors to meld.
